name: vgs_watcher
description: vgs_watcher is here to make sure 42 vgs is up-to-date. Time to time, it happens that the intra Sidekiq queue is down that leads to unpleasant manual hotfix while the sidekiq is back. vgs_watcher may be here to monitors this problem and why not fix the issue on-the-go?
author: Jordane G.
